row.process:
! :IF &UC4RB_FOLDER_SIZE# < 10 ! : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: &UC4RB_HPQC_FOLDER_PATH# [&UC4RB_FOLDER_SIZE#] less than 10 MB" ! :ELSE
:SET &VARA_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.VARA.HEADLESS_CONFIG" :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_PASSWORD# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "UC4RB_HPQC_PASSWORD") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME")
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_PASSWORD#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#,,"TOP"
